## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description | Type                  | Default    |
| -------- | --------- | ----------- | --------------------- | ---------- |
| `size`   | `size`    |             | `"medium" \| "small"` | `'medium'` |


## Shadow Parts

| Part       | Description                                             |
| ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------- |
| `"base"`   | The `<details>` that holds the accordion content        |
| `"header"` | The `<summary>` that holds the accordion header content |
